TRANSCRIPTS/STU/The Living Nightmare - O: "This is Shadow we're talking about. Shadow is known to shoot people in his spare good time."
"Yeah, he's always packing heat ever since his own game."
"Which I never could actually beat that game. It was the only game that I played that I never could get to the end."
"Are you guys talking about Shadow the Hedgehog?"
"Shut up, Hedgehog for me was really easy on GameCube version."
"Yeah, well, I decided to skip past the easy mode."
"I played it on absolutely the most insane difficulty ever."
"I actually managed though after two weeks of trying to beat it on the absolute insane difficulty,"
"difficulty which would be the secret difficulty known as kiss your ass goodbye"
"whoa achievement of my gaming career that's really cool I'm also I'm also proud to"
"say this I did it without taking a single bit of damage you're lying I don't"
"I have a picture on my phone to prove it."
"I'd have to upload it to the computer, then upload it to SL."
"And unfortunately my phone is dead at the damn moment."
"I think what you will, doesn't matter to me."
"I think your armor is an overcompensation because you're lying to us."
"If you won't upload it now, I don't believe you."
"What is the other coolest gaming achievement you've done?"
"You know the Metal Gear game series, correct?"
"You know, the one where you play as Jack Wright and Metal Gear Rising Revengeance?"
"I've managed to play every single difficulty and managed to get an S-rank on every mission."
"every mission. No way. Yes. You must be pretty cool. Only one weapon. One? Yep. Wow. Using"
"Samuel Rodriguez's HF. Mirasama. That's my favorite one. Which believe it or not, I'm"
"actually carrying an SL. What? Yep want to see? Yes. Let me just un-sheet this"
"Hello! Hey Jeff, you're a soma! Whoa! That's so cool. This is my pride and joy blade."
"It reminds me of the shock sword from Fallout."
"Oh, the shock sword from Fallout from 3."
"Even though it's handled to this baby."
"This baby could cut that thing in half."
"Wow, can you slice me in half with it?"
"I won't use my blade on an innocent person. I will only use this blade to kill evil."
"This tank cost me 1,250L and it was the best investment I ever made."
"Well, $2,520, so it was about like $15 for me."
"I usually buy spaceships with those prices."
"Is that the most you've ever spent in SL?"
"No, the most I ever spent on SL was on this armor, which cost me $8,888."
"I'd be buying land with that much."
"This armor has a little built-in script for the DCS hood."
"As long as I wear it, I cannot be injured by any DCS user."
"You're like the coolest person I've ever met in SL."
"Well, that's why my tag says ""royal family"" because I run a group on here where I'm the"
"patriarch, which is why my name is Genesis Valentine."
"My family has one rule that must be followed at all times."
"Never resort to underhanded tactics to win a battle."
"Of course, I have fought underhanded once, but that was a long, long time ago."
"Now before I inherited this beautiful blade, I was a bit of an underhanded cheating scoundrel."
"And because of my underhanded ways, I became cursed."
"This curse turned me into a demon, which is why I have horns."
"It almost reminds me of nightmare for Soul Collabur."
"Believe it or not, some people have actually called me a nightmare."
"You're actually kind of lucky that I put the blade back."
"If you would have been a little closer, just from being around the blade, if you had a health"
"bar above you, the health bar would slowly start draining down to zero."
"Whoa. The heat of the blade does environmental damage, which slowly kills my opponent."
"Over time, but it still slowly kills them."
"That's why I paid so much for it."
"I'll give you five second life for it."
"Yep, I can't even modify this thing."
"It's no mod, no copy, no trans."
"Oh, that's why I have a little special trick."
"I asked the seller when I bought it if my version could be copied and he was nice enough"
"I have a version for the garrion combat meter, DCS, carnage, and linden labs damage."
"The carnage one though, I kind of can't use because it's too overpowered."
"I don't even think the Dragon Balls of you joke would be a right estimate for that thing."
"I actually used it on someone and they kind of immediately lagged and logged off of Second Life"
"and they haven't been seen again. Whoa! Whoa! It breaks through the fourth wall and destroys"
"your opponent's computer. You killed him, I'll rule!"
"And I only hit him once and next thing you know"
"The only reason I used that particular version of the blade was because the guy was insulting my daughter."
"Basically called her a lying horrid piece of trash that deserves to basically die in a ditch somewhere."
"Oh, I tore that fucker to pieces."
"And I enjoyed every second of it!"
